profile:
► Victorious Carpet and Flooring Sales, Installation, Repair, and Carpet Re-Stretching Services ◄
 
▬ Visit us online at → https://www.victoriousflooring.com/
Your Experienced Carpet & Flooring Sales, Installation, Repair & Stretching Services With Satisfaction Guaranteed! 

****

We have solutions for all occasions and budgets! Now select beautiful and less costly carpets from inside your own home or office! Our free Shop-At-Home service lets you choose the right carpet in the comfort of your own place. Make the right choice when viewing samples within your décor and under your lighting conditions. Take advantage of our low-cost overhead now! We'll be happy to assist you in making the right choice for your décor and budget. 
Call us today or e-mail us to book your Shop@Home visit!
 
▬ Things Happen... We Can Help!
We offer a wide range of installation and repair services for common flooring materials across the GTA with no obligation consulting and estimate service. 
 
▬ Top 10 Reasons Why You Should Buy From Us;
1. GTA's Award-Winning Service - Rated Toronto's #1 Carpet Installation Company for the last 14 years in the row 
2. Honest Upfront Pricing - No Hidden Costs. Written Contract, Detailed-Itemized Estimate / Invoicing Provided
3. Computerized Calculation to Optimize Material Usage With Minimum Wastage 
4. Free "Accidental Service Request"
5. Unbeatable Lifetime Labour Warranty 
6. Clear Explanations & Written Pre-Installation Checklist 
7. In-house Installation Service. 
We DON'T Sub-Contract. (Read Competitors & Big Box Stores Fine Print) 
8. Professional / Written Site Inspection 
9. Convenient weekend and evening appointments 
10. Wide Range of Payment Options (Finance, Personal Cheque, Interac E-mail Money Transfer, PayPal, Visa & MasterCard)
 
▬ Buy with confidence! All of our products are DIRECTLY from the manufacturer.
Residential Wall to Wall Carpet Sales, Carpet Installation, Carpet Repairs & Carpet Stretching Services 
A wide range of Berber (Loop), Plush, Patterned, Saxony Carpet Selection.
Now offering inexpensive Basement Carpeting. Full cover Stairs or Runners. Silky soft Bedroom / Living Room Carpeting 
 
▬ We are also specialized in;
• Berber Snag Repairs
• Wrinkled, Bulged & Buckled Carpets (Carpet Stretching Services)
• Irons Burns
• Bleach & Paint Spots
• Pet (Cat, Dog) Damages, and much more!
 
Please feel free to call us at (416) 858-7006 Or visit us at https://www.victoriousflooring.com/
7 days a week for a no-obligation estimate!

services:
We offer a wide range of carpeting services in Toronto including but not limited to Wall to Wall Carpet Sales, Installation, Repairs and Stretching. 
 
Not only supplying you with affordable and competitive priced wall to wall carpets, but also providing expertise repairs for all sorts of carpet issues. 
 
With our satisfaction quarantined service, you will receive a life time labour warranty that covers wrinkling, bulging, split seams, detached edges and anything else related to our craftsmanship. 
 
What’s more, we also include Free of Charge Accidental Service to appreciate your business by choosing us. We won’t let anything stay between you and your newly installed carpet, ensuring you with one of the best “Flawless Customer Service” available for your custom tailored needs.

profile:
Carpet & Rug Retailers, Floor Laying & Refinishing, Floor Retailers

Alliance Floor Source is a Toronto-based hardwood, laminate and carpeting specialist. We sell only top quality merchandise and offer the best brands in the industry.  We offer flooring products for the "do-it-yourselfer" or we can professionally install it for you. In either case, we believe in providing only the best in products and customer service. 
Selecting the appropriate flooring is an investment that will prove to be one of the smartest and most durable you'll make. As one of the most important design elements in any home or business, hardwood, laminate and cork flooring are used everywhere to give warmth, a distinguished look and a timeless beauty to any room. Whether you require a new floor or a retrofit of an existing floor in either a residential or commercial property, we will do our best to find the most suitable option for your particular needs and budget.
We have been satisfying the needs of homeowners, contractors and builders for almost 25 years.  When dealing with Alliance Floor Source you will not only be satisfied with the quality of our products, but you will also love (we hope and trust) the exceptional customer service and our commitment to making your flooring project a most enjoyable experience.
With your cooperation in the after installation care and maintenance of your new floor, you will have an investment to be happy about and be satisfied with for many years to come.

profile:
We cover the whole of the GTA and beyond and carry most major brands of hardwood, laminate, carpet, tile and vinyl. We are also ICC (Insurance Claims Collaborative) registered for restoration of damaged floors.
 
Why not pop in to our showroom in Newmarket or Thornhill  where you can see our collection first hand, along with current special offers, or visit www.floorsdirectnorth.ca
 
We offer a shop-at-home service, first-class customer care and a friendly smile. Our customers are important to us and whilst we aren't perfect, we try hard and pride ourselves on the care and attention we give to every project. Our installers are masters in their fields and you can rest assured you'll be very happy with the installation of your chosen flooring. 
 
We also specialize in custom made stairs. 
 
You can also visit our second location 
134 Doncaster Ave
Units 1 & 2
Thornhill
905 235 7155

Family operated  with the passion of creating something on Our  own, We  developed Focus On Flooring and General Contracting. With many years of experience and a keen eye for details, we carefully picked our  team of Contractors .

Helping local homeowners achieve their goals is one of Our motivations for growing business. Along with experiencing Our client’s appreciation and happiness at the completion of each project.

Remodeling houses and creating  at home ambiance for Our  clients has always been a long-term goal of Focus on Flooring . With Our  growing team of professionals,  We were not only been able to accomplish that but surpassed Our expectations.

With over 15 years of experience in the industry and running a successful business; this gives our clients peace of mind, and You can be sure that You’re in good hands.

Please come visit our showroom! For the convenience of our dear clients our showroom is full of flooring that meet your lifestyle.

profile:
The Home of Satisfied Customers!

Flooring Liquidators is your one stop , full package solution when it comes to flooring. With our expanding retail locations, large purchasing power and connections with local and foreign flooring manufacturers, we are able to offer our customers top quality flooring at the most competitive prices.

The Largest Flooring Selection

Flooring Liquidators carries a wide array of Canadian and Exotic flooring products. We’ve earned a high reputation with our products and services, and we’ve been the go-to retail store for many homeowners, contractors, realtors, designers, and builders.

Our tagline is ‘Everything is on Sale’ because of our affordable prices. We offer no compromise on our flooring products, since everything is backed by a manufacturer’s warranty to offer you peace of mind.

Visit one of our Showrooms Near you!

Flooring Liquidators currently has 13 showrooms and is rapidly expanding with the aim of becoming a dominant force in the flooring industry. Our service areas are all of the GTA, Toronto, Brampton, Hamilton, Oshawa, Mississauga, Newmarket, Barrie, London, and Ottawa. Contact us now for a location near you.

profile:
Dominion Rug & Home has been serving the greater Toronto area since 1940. For over 72 years we have provided quality carpets and rugs and have now added hardwood, cork and LVT to our product line. The business is well into it’s third generation of ownership, currently owned by Ben Baum, who has been  servicing the design trade and luxury market  since 1984.
 
Our philosophy is simple. We believe in the “Platinum Rule”, we treat people the way they want to be treated. We listen to our customers, and combine the finest quality floor covering with dependable installation and professional service to assure your satisfaction. In other words we take you on a “Personalized Customer Journey”. Our highly experienced staff will take the time to answer your questions and listen to your concerns to understand your specific decorating needs. ”We Care”. We want you to feel like you are the most important part of our business… because you are!

profile: Chestnut Flooring is Toronto's premier flooring destination, trusted and recommended by interior designers. We offer a select assortment of quality flooring products in chic and on-trend styles. Visit our Greater Toronto Area store to discover a unique selection of hardwood, laminate, luxury vinyl, and carpet. Our products and brands have all been selectively chosen, to exceed a high standard of quality and style. Speak with our flooring expert team to get professional guidance and recommendations for your next flooring project. With exceptional technical knowledge and design proficiency, they'll guide you through all of the intricacies that you should keep in mind when selecting the right floors. Discover a different level of aesthetics that can be achieved with patterned floors, wide plank hardwood, parquets, custom combined floor styles, and much more. Achieve a higher level of style with your flooring, by choosing the flooring provider that GTA designers choose most.

profile:
We are a contractor with focus of residential FLOORING and STAIR works. Unlike other contractor who assign their crews to do all kind of flooring works, we assign specific crews to do specific flooring installation to ensure the quality.
We do various flooring materials and stair, and we offer following services:
- Supply & installation Hardwood, Laminate, and Vinyl flooring
- Supply & installation of Ceramic / Porcelain / Stone tile for Kitchen / Bathroom floor & wall
- Supply & install wood stair with either wood or iron pickets.

We come for free estimate, provide good advice during findings and discussion during the visit to ensure you choose the right materials for your project.  More over, we will also show some samples you may choose for your project.

Doing flooring & stair right at the first time is very important because it cost a lot of money and cause disturbance during the works.  We aim to provide Excellent QUALITY, SERVICE and TIMELY project execution to turn you to our another happy customers.

profile: At General Flooring Canada, we provide top-notch flooring solutions catering to the needs of our customers. We’re dedicated to run our business in an honest and professional way to strive to make a positive impact on our customers. Our range of services includes laminate flooring, hardwood flooring, engineered hardwood flooring and vinyl flooring. Here at GFC, we’re committed to providing quality and customer satisfaction through our innovative product design. Our vast selection of flooring includes smooth, wire-brushed, hand-scraped, oil finished, semi-gloss, ultra matt, unfinished and more. With a lavish 200k+sq.ft of flooring in stock, we ensure to deliver flooring products right at your doorstep. Also our showroom offers flooring options, surface types and gloss levels with over 100+ color to choose from, assures that you always get what you need. Apart from providing flooring products, we indulge in doing installation services. We also work directly with Canadian hardwood manufacturers and import Canadian made laminate flooring and vinyl flooring. We have made the purchasing process easier by establishing a reliable and streamlined inventory returning and exchanging process. More importantly, our mission is to bring you the best flooring possible and make your life better.

profile:
Why Choose Us
We handle a wide range of jobs everyday, from offices, apartment building corridors and suite, private residences, retirement communities, rental properties and anything in between; we’re geared to accommodate jobs of any size.

As for our trained technicians and tradesmen, the lead hand of any of our crews carries a minimum of 15 to 20 years of experience in their respective fields; installing, repairing and maintaining many types of carpet & flooring. At Assured Flooring, our clients experience personalized attention. Communication is key and we go out of our way to keep you in the loop as we progress through out the project. We pay close attention to detail and take pride in every installation. The results are a beautifully finished product that anyone would be happy to have.

profile:
We offer one of the largest selections of quality hardwood flooring in the GTA area in our spacious 4,000 square foot showroom. We are distributors of Mirage, Vintage, PG Model, Coswick, Superior, Satin Finish, Bruce, Armstrong, Dubeau, Kentwood,Husky,Kronotex and Torlys.

From Selection to Installation We are Your Hardwood Floor Store
***
For purchasers of flooring products we provide the following services:
***
Hardwood Selection: We are one of the few locations in the Greater Toronto Area where people can view large size samples of virtually every style and color of hardwood flooring from all major suppliers. All in the comfortable, non-pressure atmosphere of our showroom.
***
Laminate Wood Selection: For those seeking durable, lower cost flooring with the look of real wood, we offer numerous wood laminate flooring options.
***
Design Assistance: Knowledgeable Markham Flooring sales staff are available to help you make the right flooring décor decision.
***
Practical Advice: For those planning do-it-yourself flooring projects, we can answer all your questions.
***
Installation: Our expert installers can come to your home and flawlessly install your new flooring.
***
Delivery: For large orders we can deliver to your home or building site through a third party with a cost. Alternatively, you can back your truck up to our warehouse loading dock.
***
Availability: Most popular flooring styles and colors from all our suppliers are consistently available in our warehouse. Specialized orders can be fulfilled within days.
***
Accessories: We sell nails, underlay paper, glue, floor care products and other flooring products you may need.
***
For our suppliers and the flooring industry in general, Markham Flooring provides an efficient and reliable service for the distribution and marketing of their products.
